sentences.en: Consumer advocacy groups are not so enthusiastic about removing restrictions on the telephone companies.
sentences.cn: 保护消费者团体并不热衷于取消对电话公司的限制。

sentences.en: Consumer demand led to higher imports of manufactured goods.
sentences.cn: 消费者需求促使制造商品的进口量增加了。

sentences.en: Consumer spending grew unchecked.
sentences.cn: 群众消费不受抑制地增长.

sentences.en: Consumer spending was down by 0.1% last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月消费支出下降了0.1%。

sentences.en: Consumers will soon be paying higher airfares.
sentences.cn: 不久消费者就要支付更高的机票价了。

sentences.en: Firms have to be responsive to consumer demand.
sentences.cn: 公司必须对顾客的需求作出积极反应。

sentences.en: In a consumer taste test, Coke went up against Pepsi.
sentences.cn: 在一次消费者品尝测验中, 可口可乐与百事可乐交锋了.

sentences.en: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ) .
sentences.cn: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.en: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ).
sentences.cn: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.en: New consumer credit fell to $3.7 billion in August.
sentences.cn: 8月份新增消费信贷降至37亿美元。

sentences.en: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute.
sentences.cn: 保障消费者利益已在法令里作了规定.

sentences.en: Some shops are bowing to consumer pressure and stocking organically grown vegetables.
sentences.cn: 一些商店迫于顾客的压力，开始供应有机蔬菜。

sentences.en: sources of consumer advice
sentences.cn: 给予消费者建议的信息来源

sentences.en: South Korea's imports of consumer products jumped 33% in this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，韩国消费产品的进口激增了33%。

sentences.en: Such laws could protect the consumer from harmful or dangerous remedies.
sentences.cn: 这样的法规可以保护消费者免受有害或者危险药品的威胁。

sentences.en: The choice of consumer goods available in local shops is small.
sentences.cn: 当地商店可供选择的消费品很少。

sentences.en: The consumer is getting screwed by cover charges as well.
sentences.cn: 这名消费者也被诈取了服务费。

sentences.en: the limitless variety of consumer products
sentences.cn: 种类繁多的消费产品

sentences.en: The reduced consumer demand is also affecting company profits.
sentences.cn: 消费需求的降低也影响到了公司的利润。

sentences.en: The Treasury has long been predicting an upturn in consumer spending.
sentences.cn: 财政部早就预测消费者支出会出现上扬。

sentences.en: This is likely to revive consumer spending and a whole raft of consumer industries.
sentences.cn: 这可能会带动消费性支出和一大批消费工业的复苏。

消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: someone who buys and uses products and services
